flattenedModel.name: Orange Juice Production Line
flattenedModel.label: Production Line
flattenedModel.description: An integrated production line covering fruit reception, extraction, processing, pasteurization, packaging, transport, and blending.
rulesAndConstraints: The production line must maintain continuous flow between stages (fruitReception-001 -> extractionUnit-001 -> clarificationUnit-001 -> ...).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Passes packaged product to transport operations.

flattenedModel.name: Fruit Reception
flattenedModel.label: Fruit Reception
flattenedModel.description: Stage where incoming oranges are received, washed, and pre-graded.

actions.actionDescription: Schedule inspection for each incoming truck load.

rulesAndConstraints: Fruit must be processed within 24 hours (maxStorageTime) to avoid quality degradation.
Receives raw fruit from truck unloading (rawTruckDelivery-001).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Sends fruit to Washing Station after truck unloading.
Passes pre-graded fruit to Extraction Unit.

flattenedModel.name: Washing Station
flattenedModel.label: Washing
flattenedModel.description: Washes fruit to remove dirt, debris and pesticide residues.
rulesAndConstraints: Use recycled condensate where possible to optimize water usage.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Passes washed fruit to Grading Station.

flattenedModel.name: Grading Station
flattenedModel.label: Grading
flattenedModel.description: Manually or automatically grades fruit and rejects damaged fruit.

actions.actionDescription: Begin grading process to reject substandard fruit.

rulesAndConstraints: Reject fruit that fails visual inspection; refer to standardized grading rules (gradingProtocol-001).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Sends graded, approved fruit to the Extraction Unit.

flattenedModel.name: Juice Extraction
flattenedModel.label: Extraction
flattenedModel.description: Stage where washed and graded fruit is processed to extract juice.

actions.actionDescription: Optimize extraction speed based on fruit size and ripeness.

rulesAndConstraints: Ensure proper calibration with Grading Station outputs (gradingStation-001).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives pre-graded fruit from Grading Station.
Sends extracted juice to Clarification Unit.

flattenedModel.name: Juice Extractor
flattenedModel.label: Extractor
flattenedModel.description: Machine that squeezes juice out of fruit. It transforms raw fruit into juice by mechanical pressure.
rulesAndConstraints: Fruit size must match extractor settings as defined by Grading Station (gradingStation-001).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Squeezer option transforms fruit into juice with moderate yield.
Reamer option transforms fruit into juice with higher yield.

flattenedModel.name: Squeezer
flattenedModel.label: Squeezer
flattenedModel.description: A squeezer-type extraction option with moderate yield and energy consumption.
rulesAndConstraints: Maintain even pressure distribution to avoid over-squeezing fruit (juiceExtractor-001).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Works in conjunction with the cutter which pre-cuts fruit for optimal juice release.

flattenedModel.name: Reamer
flattenedModel.label: Reamer
flattenedModel.description: A reamer-type extraction option optimized for high yield with a gentle process.
rulesAndConstraints: Ensure minimal mechanical stress to preserve flavor integrity.

flattenedModel.name: Cutter Assembly
flattenedModel.label: Cutter
flattenedModel.description: Cuts fruit to optimize juice extraction and facilitate separation processes.
rulesAndConstraints: Blade replacement recommended every 500 operational hours.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Ensures fruit is pre-cut properly before entering squeezer.

flattenedModel.name: Screen Filter
flattenedModel.label: Screen
flattenedModel.description: Removes pulp and seeds from juice after extraction.
rulesAndConstraints: Clean filter element every 50 operating hours to prevent clogging.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Feeds filtered juice to clarifier.

flattenedModel.name: Clarification Unit
flattenedModel.label: Clarification
flattenedModel.description: Removes pulp and impurities from extracted juice.

actions.actionDescription: Begin the clarification process to remove solids and improve clarity.

rulesAndConstraints: Juice must be clarified to remove >90% of solids.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives extracted juice from the Extraction Unit.
Passes clarified juice to the Concentration Unit.

flattenedModel.name: Clarifier
flattenedModel.label: Clarifier
flattenedModel.description: Uses centrifugal and filtration processes to separate pulp from juice.
rulesAndConstraints: Maintain filter integrity and monitor pressure drop for effective operation.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives juice filtered by screen.

flattenedModel.name: Filter Element
flattenedModel.label: Filter Element
flattenedModel.description: Removable filter element for clarifier maintenance.
rulesAndConstraints: Should be replaced when efficiency drops below 90%.

flattenedModel.name: Concentration Unit
flattenedModel.label: Concentration
flattenedModel.description: Stage where clarified juice is pre-heated and evaporated to produce concentrate.
rulesAndConstraints: Juice must achieve a concentration of at least 66째Brix for optimal storage.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives clarified juice from Clarification Unit.

flattenedModel.name: Pre-heater System
flattenedModel.label: Pre-heater
flattenedModel.description: Conditions and pre-heats juice upstream of the evaporator for efficient concentration.
rulesAndConstraints: Must deliver juice at a controlled temperature to the evaporator (evaporator).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Passes pre-heated juice to the Evaporator.

flattenedModel.name: Evaporator
flattenedModel.label: Evaporator
flattenedModel.description: Performs efficient evaporation with high thermal recovery to produce juice concentrate.
rulesAndConstraints: Uniform heat transfer must be maintained during evaporation (preHeater).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives pre-heated juice from Pre-heater.

flattenedModel.name: Pasteurization Unit
flattenedModel.label: Pasteurizer
flattenedModel.description: Integrated system incorporating heating, holding, and cooling to pasteurize juice.

actions.actionDescription: Monitor temperature and residence time to ensure effective microbial reduction.

rulesAndConstraints: Maintain a temperature-time profile to achieve required pasteurization (follow PU guidelines).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives juice from the Concentration Unit.
Delivers pasteurized juice to Packaging Unit.

flattenedModel.name: CIP System
flattenedModel.label: CIP
flattenedModel.description: Automated Clean-In-Place system for cleaning and sterilizing equipment during processing.
rulesAndConstraints: Must operate in coordination with Heating Assembly (heatingAssembly) and Recirculation Pump (recirculationPump) for effective cleaning.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Ensures system hygiene by automated cleaning cycles.

flattenedModel.name: Holding Section
flattenedModel.label: Holding Section
flattenedModel.description: Provides the necessary residence time within the pasteurization unit.

actions.actionDescription: Adjust the holding tube configuration to change residence time.

rulesAndConstraints: Holding time must be sufficient to complete pasteurization as per process guidelines.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Monitors pasteurization performance and adjusts holding time as needed.

flattenedModel.name: Holding Tube
flattenedModel.label: Holding Tube
flattenedModel.description: Ensures sufficient residence time within the holding section.
rulesAndConstraints: Inner surface must be monitored to ensure uniform flow for proper pasteurization.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Monitors residence time and recirculates if needed.

flattenedModel.name: Standard Holding Tube
flattenedModel.label: Standard
flattenedModel.description: Standard design providing the required residence time.
rulesAndConstraints: Standard configuration meets baseline pasteurization residence time.

flattenedModel.name: Extended Holding Tube
flattenedModel.label: Extended
flattenedModel.description: Extended design for longer residence time if needed for higher microbial load.
rulesAndConstraints: Extended configuration used when a longer holding time is required; ensure compatibility with pasteurizer control settings.

flattenedModel.name: Cooling Assembly
flattenedModel.label: Cooling Assembly
flattenedModel.description: Removes excess heat from pasteurized juice to bring it to the proper filling temperature.
rulesAndConstraints: Cooling capacity must match the pasteurizer output to prevent product overcooling.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives pasteurized juice from Pasteurization Unit.

flattenedModel.name: Cooling Exchanger
flattenedModel.label: Cooling Exchanger
flattenedModel.description: Removes excess heat to bring pasteurized juice to target temperature before packaging.
rulesAndConstraints: Cooling must be consistent; monitor coolant flow and temperature.
Ensure regular cleaning to prevent fouling (refer to CIP system: cipSystem).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives pasteurized juice for cooling.
Regular maintenance required to check thermal performance.

flattenedModel.name: Water Cooled
flattenedModel.label: Water Cooled
flattenedModel.description: Operates with water as the primary coolant for stable performance.
rulesAndConstraints: Monitor coolant inlet/outlet temperature to ensure effective cooling.

flattenedModel.name: Glycol Cooled
flattenedModel.label: Glycol Cooled
flattenedModel.description: Uses glycol coolant for achieving lower final temperatures on the product.
rulesAndConstraints: Check glycol quality regularly to ensure proper cooling performance.

flattenedModel.name: Packaging Unit
flattenedModel.label: Packaging
flattenedModel.description: Stage where pasteurized juice is filled into consumer packages.

actions.actionDescription: Initiate filling of juice into packaging.

rulesAndConstraints: Packaging equipment must be calibrated to fill the correct volume (per packaging specifications).

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives pasteurized juice from Pasteurization Unit.

flattenedModel.name: Carton Packaging
flattenedModel.label: Carton
flattenedModel.description: Packages juice in laminated cartons.
rulesAndConstraints: Carton assembly must ensure an airtight seal to preserve shelf life.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Compare packaging performance with alternative systems.

flattenedModel.name: Glass Packaging
flattenedModel.label: Glass
flattenedModel.description: Juice is hot filled into glass bottles.
rulesAndConstraints: Glass bottles require pre-heating and cooling control to avoid breakage.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives hot-filled juice; ensure temperature compatibility.

flattenedModel.name: Plastic Packaging
flattenedModel.label: Plastic
flattenedModel.description: Juice is aseptically filled into PET bottles.
rulesAndConstraints: PET bottles must be maintained at aseptic conditions to prevent recontamination.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Regularly monitor sealing integrity.

flattenedModel.name: Transport & Handling
flattenedModel.label: Transport
flattenedModel.description: Manages shipping and distribution of bulk or packaged juice.

actions.actionDescription: Plan shipment and logistics for finished product.

rulesAndConstraints: Ensure product is maintained within appropriate temperature (cold chain) during transit.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives packaged juice for shipping.

flattenedModel.name: Blending House
flattenedModel.label: Blending
flattenedModel.description: Where concentrates and NFC streams are blended into consistent juice products.

actions.actionDescription: Blend multiple juice batches to meet quality targets.

rulesAndConstraints: Blended product must meet final Brix specifications; discrepancies must be corrected via in-line mixing adjustments.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Receives concentrate streams for blending.

flattenedModel.name: Maintenance Service
flattenedModel.label: Maintenance
flattenedModel.description: Preventive and corrective maintenance including inspections, cleaning, replacement schedules and troubleshooting.
rulesAndConstraints: This service applies to all critical equipment (heatExchanger, recirculationPump, coolingExchanger, plasticPackaging-001) and must follow the manufacturer's recommended schedules.

relatedObjects.relationshipDescription: Monitored for maintenance performance.
Receives maintenance checks for flow optimization.
Requires regular cleaning to ensure efficient cooling.
Monitored for sealing integrity.
